user.title: 🏠 Arrowhead Alarm Panel Setup

connection.title: 🔗 Connect to Your {panel_name}
connection.description:
Enter your panel's network information and credentials.

💡 **Tips:**
• Find the IP address in your panel's network settings
• Default port is usually {default_port}
• User PIN format: 'User Code' (e.g., '1 123' for User 1 with PIN 123)

data_description.host: The IP address where your alarm panel can be reached
data_description.user_pin: User number and PIN code separated by space (e.g., '1 123')

zone_config.title: 🏡 Configure Zones for Your {panel_name}

data_description.auto_detect_zones: Automatically detect active zones and areas from your panel's configuration
data_description.max_zones: Override the maximum zone number to monitor (8-248 zones)
data_description.areas: Specify which areas are active (leave empty for auto-detection)
data_description.configure_zone_names: Set custom names for your zones instead of 'Zone 001', 'Zone 002', etc.

zone_names.title: 🏷️ Name Your Zones
zone_names.description:
{description}

💡 **Tip:** Use descriptive names like 'Front Door', 'Kitchen Window', 'Garage Motion' for easier identification.

data.skip_zone_naming: ⏭️ Skip naming (use default Zone 001, Zone 002, etc.)

output_config.title: ⚡ Configure Outputs for Your {panel_name}

data_description.max_outputs: How many outputs to create switches for (1-{max_outputs})
